module.name: Feature Code Admin
module.changelog: *13.0.6.4* FREEPBX-14232 FC accepting same customize code for different features *13.0.6.3* FREEPBX-13806 Fix validation length *13.0.6.2* FREEPBX-7373 Hide *11/*12 feature codes by default exposed with Advanced Settings or if in deviceanduser mode *13.0.6.1* FREEPBX-13348 - Fix invalid regexp in feature code validation *13.0.6* FREEPBX-12232 Issues if there is a feature code conflict *13.0.5* Add BMO Search provider *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow Any valid DTMF digit in any position *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow # *13.0.3* Fixed error reported on the forums *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visual Tweaks and fixes *13.0.1alpha1* Consistency changes
